contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Archbishop | honorific-prefix = | name = Jukka Paarma | honorific-suffix = | archbishop_of = [[Archbishop of Turku and Finland]] | image = Jukka Paarma.JPG | caption = Archbishop Jukka Paarma in his formal robe | province = [[Western Finland]] | diocese = [[Archdiocese of Turku]] | see = [[Turku Cathedral]] | enthroned = December 1, 1998 | ended = June 1, 2010 | predecessor = [[John Vikström]] | successor = [[Kari Mäkinen]] | ordination = | consecration = | other_post = | birth_name = | birth_date = December 1, 1942 | birth_place = [[Lappeenranta]] | death_date = | death_place = | buried = | nationality = [[Finnish people|Finnish]] | religion = [[Lutheran]] | residence = | parents = | spouse = Pirjo Paarma | children = | occupation = | profession = | alma_mater = | signature = }} '''Jukka Paarma''' (born December 1, 1942 in [[Lappeenranta]]) was the [[Archbishop of Turku and Finland]],<ref>http://evl.fi/EVLfi.nsf/Documents/C1596775A00C929BC2256FEA003A230C?OpenDocument&lang=FI</ref> and the spiritual head of the [[Evangelical Lutheran Church of Finland]]. He retired as Archbishop on June 1, 2010.<ref>http://195.236.185.74/ktuutiset.nsf/3dc960bd906d27ddc2256d410048dad1/abe3c9872423530fc2257639002b97cf?OpenDocument</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} {{s-start}} {{s-rel}} {{s-bef|before=[[John Vikström]]}} {{s-ttl|title=[[Archbishop of Turku and Finland]]|years=1998 — 2010}} {{s-aft|after=[[Kari Mäkinen]]}} {{s-end}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Paarma, Jukka | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = December 1, 1942 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Lappeenranta]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Paarma, Jukka}} [[Category:1942 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Lappeenranta]] [[Category:Lutheran archbishops]] [[Category:Finnish priests]] [[Category:Archbishops and bishops of Turku]] [[Category:20th-century Christian archbishops]] [[Category:21st-century Christian archbishops]] {{christian-clergy-stub}} {{lutheran-stub}}
